author: craigmcc
msg: Increase the validation checking that occurs when web.xml files are being
parsed, to complain about the following errors:
* <filter-mapping> that is malformed, or specifies a filter name that
does not exist
* <servlet-mapping> that is malformed, or specifies a servlet name
that does not exist
* <context-param> that is malformed, or has a duplicate parameter name
There's lots more room for improvement, which will assist developers in
assuring that their web.xml files conform to spec requirements, and will
thus are more likely to run on other servlet containers as well.

author: craigmcc
msg: Update the README file to reflect the availability of top-level build scripts,
and the fact that you can now download a "jakarta-servletapi-4.0" nightly build
that contains the servlet 2.3 / JSP 1.2 API classes.

author: craigmcc
msg: Change the order of welcome files in the default list.

author: craigmcc
msg: Correct the spelling of the session cookie name.
NOTE:  Be sure you do a complete rebuild (./build.sh clean ; ./build.sh)
after downloading this class -- just recompiling the one class will not work.

author: craigmcc
msg: Customize the component name logged by StandardWrapper calls to log() so that
it includes both the context path and the servlet name.  Otherwise, it is
difficult to tell messages apart when they are in the same log file.
